title: "Falling inflation boosts hope of early ECB rate cut"
excerpt: "Crucial to ECB thinking will be tomorrow’s EU-wide data, which is expected to show inflation falling from December’s 2.9 per cent. Another crucial piece of information in determining when rates should be cut will be on wage growth, a point reiterated yesterday by ECB president Christine Lagarde."
